content: there s no better yarn than red heart amigurumi for creating these cheerful crochet chameleons that will brighten up your collection you get all the colors you need in 1 wheel of yarn to make 2 delightful toys worked in rounds pattern is great for sharpening your single_crochet and single_crochet 2 together skills give this pair to make someone s day materials 4 black safety eyes ¼ 6 mm for both versions fiberfil stuffing yarn needle stitch marker
